definition: vascular cambium (layer of tissue responsible for growth inside wood)
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: In the tangential view, the procarnbialcylinder shows a rather homogeneous structure.
sentences.chinese: 径向切面观，原形成层环呈现出较均一的结构。

sentences.english: The different hormone combinations showed the inhibitions on the differentiations of procambial bundles in the two varieties.
sentences.chinese: 不同激素组合对原形成层束的分化均有抑制作用。

sentences.english: The callus originated from several parts, but mainly from cambium .
sentences.chinese: 愈伤组织是多起源的，但主要源于形成层。

sentences.english: The base of scion is cut diagonally to expose a large oval of cambium.
sentences.chinese: 接穗的基部被切成斜形，暴露出椭圆形的大圈形成层。

sentences.english: Study of the Transition from Procambium to Vascular Cambium In Erythrina Arborescens Roxb.
sentences.chinese: 原形成层向维管形成层转化的研究。

sentences.english: Study of the Transition from Procambium to Vascular Cambium In Erythrina Arborescens Roxb.
sentences.chinese: 原形成层向维管形成层转化的研究。

sentences.english: The base of scion is cut diagonal ly to expose a large oval of cambium.
sentences.chinese: 接穗的基部被切成斜形，暴露出椭圆形的大圈形成层。

sentences.english: In addtion, there was callus from xylem.
sentences.chinese: 愈伤组织是多起源的，但主要源于形成层。

sentences.english: Increasing and decreasing of stored starch are closely related to the periodicity of cambial activity.
sentences.chinese: 淀粉储量的消长与形成层活动周期有很强的相关关系。

sentences.english: Cells of the epiblem dedifferentiate and divide periclinally to produce the phellogen.
sentences.chinese: 表皮细胞反分化而行平周分裂形成木栓形成层。

sentences.english: As all cells expand to their mature size, the cambial cells are Pushed outward.
sentences.chinese: 当所有细胞成熟后，形成层这层细胞便推向外围。

sentences.english: Starch grains decreased progressively after cambial activity was resumed in early spring until they disappeared in all the stem tissues.
sentences.chinese: 早春形成层恢复活动后，淀粉贮量逐渐减少直至消失。

sentences.english: The procambium continuously develop to the apex after it arises from the place where the leaf primordia originates from below the apical meristem.
sentences.chinese: 原形成层在顶端分生组织之下叶原基起源的地方发生。

sentences.english: In woody plants, tissues outside of the vascular cambium .
sentences.chinese: 木本植物维管形成层外部的组织。

sentences.english: Observations were made on the process of transition from procambium to camhiumin the shoots of Camptotheca acuminata Decne.
sentences.chinese: 观察了枣树茎中原形成层到形成层的转化过程。

sentences.english: Observations were made on the process of transition from procambium to camhiumin the shoots of Camptotheca acuminata Decne.
sentences.chinese: 观察了枣树茎中原形成层到形成层的转化过程。

definition: terminal bud (growing at the tip of a plant)
scion (branch or bud that is grafted onto rootstock)
axillary bud/bud growing from axil of plant
rootstock (stem onto which a branch is grafted)
